boot_command: <tab> text noacpi ks=http://{{ .HTTPIP }}:{{ .HTTPPort }}/ks.cfg PASSWORD={{ user `password` }} BOOTLOADER_PASSWORD={{ user `bootloader_password` }} HTTP_IP={{ .HTTPIP }} HTTP_PORT={{ .HTTPPort }} HYPERVISOR_IDENTIFIER={{ user `virtualbox_identifier` }}<enter>
builders.name: {{ user `virtualbox_identifier` }}
builders.output_directory: builds/{{ user `group_id` }}/{{ user `artifact_id` }}/{{ user `major_version` }}.{{ user `minor_version` }}.{{ user `patch_version` }}.{{ user `incremental_version` }}/{{ user `virtualbox_identifier` }}
builders.vm_name: {{ user `group_id` }}.{{ user `virtualbox_identifier` }}.{{ user `artifact_id` }}-{{ user `major_version` }}.{{ user `minor_version` }}.{{ user `patch_version` }}.{{ user `incremental_version` }}

environment_vars: OUTPUT_FILE=builds/{{ user `group_id` }}/{{ user `artifact_id` }}/{{ user `major_version` }}.{{ user `minor_version` }}.{{ user `patch_version` }}.{{ user `incremental_version` }}/variables.json
